buginformation.summary: dependency sorting with closure pass set false longer works
buginformation.description: what steps will reproduce the problem instantiate new instance compiler set closure pass false prevent goog require goog provide removal compiler options set closure pass false turn dependency sorting dependency options dependency options new dependency options dependency options set dependency sorting true compile code what the expected output dependent files should sorted and concatenated their dependent order what you see instead dependent files are not sorted what version the product are you using what operating system 1824 mac please provide any additional information below this worked the 1810 release however looks like this was changed 1824 the compiler now expects closure pass true for dependency sorting work http code google com closure compiler source detail path trunk src com google javascript jscomp compiler java amp 1824 what are looking for way sort dependencies and concatenate all files their dependent order without removing the goog require goog provide calls turning closure pass true causes the goog calls replaced use this methodology local development test our code thanks seems reasonable this issue was closed revision 2073 awesome thanks bunch nick
